title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, June 13, 2020
description: On this day in 1966, the historic Miranda v. Arizona case was decided, giving rise to the requirement for police to read suspects their “Miranda rights” when arresting them.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1966, the historic Miranda v. Arizona case was decided, giving rise to the requirement for police to read suspects their “Miranda rights” when arresting them.
